long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your browsing experience with the enchanting 'Little Mermaid New Tab' extension! Every time you open a new tab, be greeted by delightful cartoonish images of Ariel from The Little Mermaid.

This magical extension brings a touch of underwater adventure and joy to your daily internet journey. The charming animations of Ariel, with her flowing red hair and shimmering tail, will not only brighten your day but also give your browser a unique and whimsical flair. Dive into the world of your favorite mermaid and her ocean adventures with every new tab. Easy to install and absolutely delightful to use, 'Little Mermaid New Tab' is perfect for Disney fans and anyone who loves the enchanting and adventurous world of Ariel. Add a sprinkle of mermaid magic to your day, every day!
This extension uses Microsoft Bing  search engine on the New Tab.
Also adds a button to disable the theme.
